titleInfo.title: USA v. Gibbons
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 26 Motion to Continue Trial as to Lance Gibbons. Jury Trial set for October 4, 2011 at 9:00 AM in Courtroom 2, Roman L. Hruska Federal Courthouse, 111 South 18th Plaza, Omaha, NE before Judge Laurie Smith Camp. The time between September 20, 2011 and October 4, 2011, shall be deemed excludable time in any computation of time under the requirement of the Speedy Trial Act. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F.A. Gossett. ( MLF, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska

titleInfo.title: USA v. Gibbons
titleInfo.subTitle: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE- sustaining 33 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture as to Lance Gibbons (1). Based upon the Forfeiture Allegation of the Indictment and the Defendants plea of guilty, the United States is hereby authorized to seize the $1,282.00 in United States Currency. The Defendants interest in the $1,282.00 in United States Currency is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law, subject to the provisions of 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n)(1). Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Orderof Forfeiture pursuant to 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n), in which all interests will be addressed. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (1 Certified copy to USM)(MKR)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE- sustaining 33 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture as to Lance Gibbons (1). Based upon the Forfeiture Allegation of the Indictment and the Defendants plea of guilty, the United States is hereby authorized to seize the $1,282.00 in United States Currency. The Defendants interest in the $1,282.00 in United States Currency is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law, subject to the provisions of 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n)(1). Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Orderof Forfeiture pursuant to 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n), in which all interests will be addressed. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (1 Certified copy to USM)(MKR)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Gibbons
titleInfo.subTitle: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report as to Defendant Lance Gibbons. Ordered by Chief Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (MHB )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report as to Defendant Lance Gibbons. Ordered by Chief Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (MHB )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Gibbons
titleInfo.subTitle: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE - The Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture (Filing No. 38) is hereby sustained as to Lance Gibbons (1). All right, title and interest in and to the $1,282.00 in United States Currency held by any person or entity are hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The $1,282.00 in United States Currency be, and the same hereby is, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law. Ordered by Chief Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (1 Certified copy to USM) (AOA)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska

All right, title and interest in and to the $1,282.00 in United States Currency held by any person or entity are hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The $1,282.00 in United States Currency be, and the same hereby is, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law. Ordered by Chief Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (1 Certified copy to USM) (AOA)
